patient_info: Abnormality of refraction,Visual loss,Cafe-au-lait spot,Cranial hyperostosis,Large cafe-au-lait macules with irregular margins,Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia,Abnormal shape of the occiput
golden_diagnosis: McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic
predict_diagnosis:
1. Neurofibromatosis type 1 (NF1)
2. McCune-Albright syndrome
3. Cherubism
4. Osteogenesis imperfecta type 1
5. MelanoticXanthogranuloma (MXG)
6. Lisch nodular corneal dystrophy
7. Hyperophic osteopathy
8. SAPHO syndrome (Synovitis, Acne, Pustulosis, Hyperostosis, and Osteitis)
9. Fibrous dysplasia without features of NF1 or McCune-Albright syndrome
10. Gorham-Stout disease (GSD) or vanishing bone disease

Please note that these diagnoses are based on the clinical presentation provided and further diagnostic testing would be necessary to confirm any of these conditions.
